title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 813a: Happy Holidays!
description: This week and next we take off for the holidays! We have an exciting schedule after the break, so stay tuned! Did you know you can watch the live recording …read more
author: Jonathan Bennett
excerpt: This week and next we take off for the holidays! We have an exciting schedule after the break, so stay tuned!
text: This week and next we take off for the holidays! We have an exciting schedule after the break, so stay tuned! Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show Right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone you’d like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here. Direct Download in DRM-free MP3. Places to follow the FLOSS Weekly Podcast: Spotify RSS Theme music: “Newer Wave” Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
html:
This week and next we take off for the holidays! We have an exciting schedule after the break, so stay tuned!

Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show Right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone you’d like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.

Places to follow the FLOSS Weekly Podcast:

  • Spotify
  • RSS

Theme music: “Newer Wave” Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
